data.prompt:
Extract comprehensive customer insights from reviews about Single Pole Rocker Switches.
The output format is JSON in English:
{
"phy": {
"<PHYSICAL>": {
"<PID>@<DETAIL>": {
"<SENT>": [ID, …]
}
}
},
"perf": {
"<PERF>": {
"<perf_id>@<DETAIL>": {
"<SENT>": {<PERF_REASON>: [ID, …]}
}
}
},
"use": {
"<USE>": {
"<SENT>": {<USE_REASON>: [ID, …]}
}
}
}

Definitions:
- <PID>: Unique ID for physical aspect ("phy"), starting from A. After Z, continue with AA, AB, and so on.
- <PHYSICAL>: Components or inherent physical properties of the Single Pole Rocker Switches without external interaction (e.g. dimensions, appearance, material type...)
- <DETAIL>: A self-contained detail summarized from the reviews.
- <SENT>: Sentiment polarity of the current <DETAIL> (- for negative, + for positive).
- ID: All review IDs mentioning the <DETAIL>
- <perf_id>: Unique ID for performance or functions ("perf"), starting from a. After z, continue with aa, ab, and so on.
- <PERF>: The Single Pole Rocker Switches' performance (e.g. flexibility, durability, ...) or behaviors under various conditions (e.g. temperature, force, chemicals...) without reference to any specific use case
- <PERF_REASON>: <PID> of the <PHYSICAL> explicitly mentioned as the cause of the <PERF>. Include all mentioned <PID>s. If no reason is mentioned, use "?". <PERF_REASON> and <PERF> should have the same sentiment polarity in the review where they are mentioned together (i.e. the same review ID are included at both locations)
- <USE>: The specific application, applicable object, method, tool, or environment for the product.
- <USE_REASON>: <perf_id> or <PID> causing the <USE>'s sentiment. Include all mentioned reasons, or "?" if none can be inferred. <USE_REASON> and <USE> should have the same sentiment polarity in the review where they are mentioned together.

CRITICAL INSTRUCTIONS:
- <PHYSICAL>/<PERF> and <DETAIL> MUST NOT include:
  * Generic statements without details (e.g., "good", "bad quality")
  * Issues unrelated to the product itself (e.g., "fast shipping", "delivery time")
- If a review mentions any physical aspect, related performance, or use together, extract them as separate entries under "phy," "perf," and "use," with no overlap.
- Make sure each <DETAIL> is under the most relevant <PHYSICAL> or <PERF> in the context of Single Pole Rocker Switches
- Preserve negations

Key Instructions:
- Break down reviews with multiple aspects, performances, or uses into individual entries.
- Escape special characters with backslash that could cause JSON syntax errors.
- Include only explicitly mentioned reasons, and use "?" where no reason is mentioned.

Final Checklist:
- Go through all reviews and ensure that no aspect, performance, use, or reason is omitted, even if only mentioned once.
- Review all entries to ensure proper separation between aspects, performances, and uses.

Print the JSON result only.
Input format:
<ID>#<review>

[[INPUT]]
0#JUNK DO NOT BUY. These switches are JUNK do not buy. I have had to go back and change them all out to new, the rocker switch breaks and will not stay on.
1#1/2 of the switches have failed in less than 4 months. 3 of the 12 in the box did not work from the beginning. 3 more failed within 4 months of installation. That's a 50% failure rate. Very dissatisfied with the quality. Return window was closed before I had them installed. Hopefully the seller will reach out and make things right.
2#Easy home improvement update of old light switches. Easy installation and covers with no visible screws made this option a great upgrade to all the light switches in our house. I replaced all the old model switches in very little time and have modernized the look of the switches from the old fashioned style.
3#Functional. The [12 Pack] MOES Paddle Rocker Light Switch offers a reliable and stylish solution for controlling lights in your home. With a 15Amp 120V capacity, these switches are perfect for most standard electrical needs. The glossy white finish adds a clean, modern touch to any room, while the paddle rocker design ensures easy operation. Self-grounding for added safety, they are durable and built to last. The pack of 12 is ideal for larger projects, providing excellent value for the price. Overall, a great choice for those looking to update their light switches with a simple and functional design.
4#Amazing. I loved them! They are of great quality.
5#1 out of 4 are bad. Awful quality switches. 25% of them don’t work.
6#Good quality at great price. This can get the job done without breaking bank. I wanted to replace 30+ switches and these for the needs!!
7#Good quality. These switches easy to install and they have good value for the price. I like the looks and size. My husband is an electrical and he also said that it has good quality.
8#Quality control. Disappointed in these switches. I’ve installed 7 of them and so far 3 have been faulty. Wouldn’t recommend to anyone
9#Good one. Good quality product. you get a good price for a package. Wanted to upgrade mine. This was a good choice.
10#Chinese junk. These look nice and have a great price but you get what you pay for. 2 of the 12 went bad after 30 days.
11#Don't buy. Don't buy. At least 7 out of 10 switches have bad contact problem. My Contractor has to took all of them out and replaced them with switches from Home depot.
12#very good quality!!! They are so good and you can see that they are of superior quality. I will do an update with them on!
13#Look and the fit. Works for me project
14#Works Well. These light switches are a game-changer! They have a sleek, modern design that upgrades the look of any room. The installation was straightforward, even for someone like me with minimal DIY skills. I love the smooth, responsive operation—no sticking or flickering issues. They’re durable and feel high-quality, not cheap like some others I’ve tried. A perfect upgrade for anyone looking for reliable and stylish switches!
15#8 moths in. This product works great swapped out my old light switches for these the looked great and maid my apartment look and feel more modern
16#This light switch is simple, sleek, and works perfectly. The paddle design is smooth and easy to use, and it fits great in my existing setup. A solid choice for anyone needing a reliable single-pole switch.
17#Good switches. These switches are just like the high quality ones you would find at a millionaires home. Satisfying click to them too. Very easy to install. Just note ground connection is on the top.
18#Great and inexpensive. I’m doing construction now And switching up all my light switches Bought these for my house , they were easy to install and work great. Good price too.
